      • forMask

        I_Right[] forMask(java.math.BigInteger mask)
        returns rights corresponding to a bit mask

        Each right is defined by a bit set into a bit mask. See policy for more details.

        Parameters:
        mask -
        Returns:
        an array of Right

      • isGranted

        Parameters:
        rightName - the symbolic name of right
        authorizationMask - the bit mask to look in
        Returns:
